content.text:
I don't know if you've seen the movie Annihilation, but the first image looks like *the shimmer*: 

![the shimmer annihilation movie screenshot](&Z+eNo/UVALQtoYABt+w0T7U3KPpQsGBdXbNcG6hPoNM=.sha256)

I ended up watching the movie because someone ( [@dan hassan](@NeB4q4Hy9IiMxs5L08oevEhivxW+/aDu/s/0SkNayi0=.ed25519)? ) posted a screenshot a few months ago and all I could find was [this discussion](%sDPXpmJJeIPWIkCZrclE3b8d214+Q0jDnTfJEIo4uyw=.sha256) when I tried to reuse the blob.

Also, the third one looks like a carnivorous psychedelic fractal flower and I have no idea why I find it so creepy.
